metadata.name: Dr.Xia And His Stuff
metadata.description:
本模组由B站炎炎夏日Quincy（UID:36295624）制作，以整活为主，大多数道具为与作者本身相关的物品或梗。由于实在不会画画，美工较差，在游戏过程中有出现各种生草图标的可能，可能比较违和，还请见谅。 初次开发，水平不高，没有加太多花里胡哨的东西，希望大家多多包涵。 本模组共添加2个新人物（普通版本和堕化版本）、12个道具（9个被动道具+3个主动道具）、3个饰品、1张卡牌、1种胶囊和1个新挑战，大多数的效果比较超模，以趣味性和为主，平衡性可能一般。如果发现bug，请及时向我反馈，谢谢大家！ 最后，感谢Steam社区Goganidze提供的多语言支持库，以及一直以来陪伴我的水友们！ 感谢@Specter 绘制的角色选择菜单素材！
（支持EID，且模组文件夹中附简体中文版模组手册）
This mod is made by Quincy(UID:36295624) from Bilibili, primarily for fun. Most items are related to my own daily life. Because of my poor painting ability, chances are that you may see weird icons or something else. Sorry about that. This is the first time I've tried to make my own mod. I haven't completely mastered modding and consequently no pretty fancy items are added. I'd appreciate it if understood. Totally, 2 new character(a normal one along with its tainted version), 12 collectibles(comprising 9 passive ones and 3 active ones), trinkets, 1 card , 1 pill and 1 new challenge are added. Most of them might have been made for fun and a bit unfair. If any bugs are found, an early feedback will be appreciated! Last but not least, thanks to the translation library provided by Goganidze from Steam Community. And also, thank those who have accompanied me for these days when I'm playing with The Binding of Isaac! Sincere gratitude to @Specter for the effort on the character menu!
(EID is completely supported in both Simplified Chinese and English. Have fun:) )
